name: Barbell Bench Press
instructions: Lie flat, grip bar wider than shoulders. Lower bar to mid-chest, then explode up.
formCues: Drive feet into floor; Squeeze shoulder blades; Tuck elbows 45 degrees.

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
instructions: Set bench to 30-45°. Press weights up until arms are straight, then lower slowly.
formCues: Drive upper back into bench; Don't clank weights at top; Keep wrists stacked.

name: Cable Flyes
instructions: Step forward from cables. Hug a 'giant tree' by bringing hands together in front.
formCues: Slight elbow bend; Squeeze chest at peak; Don't let hands pass shoulders.

name: Push-Ups
instructions: Hands slightly wider than shoulders. Lower chest to floor, keep body in a straight line.
formCues: Glutes tight; Nose forward; Chest touches floor before hips.

name: Dips
instructions: Grip parallel bars. Lower body with a slight forward lean. Push back to start.
formCues: Lean forward for chest; Elbows to 90 degrees; Don't shrug.

name: Deadlift
instructions: Bar over mid-foot. Hinge at hips, grip bar. Stand up by pushing through the floor.
formCues: Lats tight; Shin-on-bar; Push the floor away; Neutral spine.

name: Pull-Ups
instructions: Overhand grip. Pull chest toward the bar by driving elbows down.
formCues: Lead with chest; Depress shoulder blades; Avoid swinging legs.

name: Barbell Row
instructions: Bent over at 45°. Pull bar to belly button while keeping back flat.
formCues: Pull through elbows; Squeeze shoulder blades; Keep core tight.

name: Lat Pulldown
instructions: Pull bar to upper chest. Lean back slightly and focus on the wing muscles.
formCues: Elbows to back pockets; Keep chest up; Slow on the way up.

name: Seated Cable Row
instructions: Sit at machine. Pull handle to lower chest, keeping back straight.
formCues: Chest up; Don't lean back excessively; Squeeze shoulder blades.

name: Barbell Squat
instructions: Bar on traps. Sit back into hips until thighs are parallel. Drive back up.
formCues: Chest up; Knees out; Brace core; Drive through mid-foot.

name: Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Soft knees. Push hips back as far as possible while sliding bar down legs.
formCues: Back flat; Feel the hamstring stretch; Bar stays close to legs.

name: Leg Press
instructions: Sit in machine. Lower platform until knees are 90°. Press up.
formCues: Don't lock knees; Tailbone stays on seat; Controlled descent.

name: Overhead Press
instructions: Press bar from chin height to overhead. Lock out at the top.
formCues: Squeeze glutes; Head through the 'window' at top; Don't arch back.

name: Lateral Raises
instructions: Raise dumbbells out to sides to shoulder height. Lower with control.
formCues: Lead with elbows; Don't shrug; Slight forward lean.

name: Barbell Curl
instructions: Curl bar toward shoulders without moving elbows or torso.
formCues: Elbows glued to ribs; No swinging; Full range of motion.

name: Skull Crushers
instructions: Lying on bench, lower bar to forehead by bending only the elbows.
formCues: Keep elbows tucked; Don't move upper arms; Squeeze triceps at top.

name: Plank
instructions: Hold straight line on forearms and toes. Brace your stomach.
formCues: Squeeze glutes; Don't let hips sag; Look at the floor.

name: Jumping Jacks
instructions: Jump feet out while swinging arms overhead. Repeat rhythmically.
formCues: Stay light on toes; Soft knees; Consistent pace.

name: World's Greatest Stretch
instructions: Lunge forward, reach inside hand to sky, then elbow to floor.
formCues: Follow hand with eyes; Feel the hip opening; Breathe deep.

name: Cat-Cow Stretch
instructions: On all fours, alternate between arching and rounding your back.
formCues: Move with breath; Smooth transitions; Relax the neck.

name: Pigeon Pose
instructions: One knee forward, back leg straight. Sink hips toward floor.
formCues: Keep hips square; Relax into the stretch; Don't force depth.

name: Burpees
instructions: Drop to push-up, jump feet to hands, jump up. Repeat.
formCues: Explosive jump; Tight core; Maintain rhythm.
